pages.text: $(t:TIP: A drying rack can dry a lot more items than clay and can dry 9 items at once!)In order to dry clay, you'll need a drying pallet. These can be made with various types of wood, but you'll need a flint saw at the very least to craft the wooden slabs. Place the clumps of clay on the drying rack and just wait for a while.$(/t)
